job.title: Remote Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Financial Services,Information Technology and Services,Market Research
job.description:
Our client,
a well-known global information services company
, is actively looking for a
Remote Machine Learning Engineer
to join their team based out of Costa Mesa, CA! *
This role will be 100% remote*
*This is an 8 month W2 contract with benefits!*
You will be working closely with the data science and engineering teams to
provide insights for their US Retail and Online Markets.
They are looking for someone who is naturally curious in
both technical and US business domains.
Responsibilities:
Analyze structured and unstructured data sources to determine the key business questions and hypotheses that can be explored with the data sets
Evaluate approaches and algorithms based on available data and research objectives
Develop experimental ML models to solve complex data mining problems
Desired Skills
Bachelor's degree
3+ years of experience
Knowledge of SQL, Snowflake, Pyspark, and AWS Sagemaker
